body:
I appreciate that spack can generate lua module files, but I wish the module files respected the spack default version numbers.  For instance, if I define 2.7.14 to be the default python version in packages.yaml, and I install multiple pythons (because spack makes it so easy!), I'd like the default lua module for python to be version 2.7.14.  Spack doesn't seem to be assigning default versions for the lua module files.

Here's some information on what I'd like: https://lmod.readthedocs.io/en/latest/060_locating.html#marking-a-version-as-default
title: default versions for lmod modules
